Entries.danceRejection: I'm... flattered, @. But it would cause too much of a scene. I'm sorry.$s
Entries.Mon8: @!$h#$e#It's nice to see you. Stay for a while.$h
Entries.Mon10: Hello, @.$h#$e#You should come over for dinner sometime.$7
Entries.Tue10: Living on a farm seems very sustainable.#$e#Not as sustainable as my tent, but...$h
Entries.Wed8: Tell me more about yourself, @.#$e#You're a very interesting person.$h
Entries.Wed10: I might be happy living on a farm someday...$6#$e#...Just a thought.$8
Entries.Thu8: I trust you, @. You're a good friend.$h
Entries.Thu10: You're very unique, @. I've never met someone quite like you before.$8
Entries.Fri8: You've shown me so much kindness, @.#$e#I can never fully repay it, but here is a token of my thanks. [226 212 228 202 728]
Entries.Fri10: What are you doing tonight, @?#$e#Come and visit me if you like.$h
Entries.Sat8: I said I was happy by myself before, but I'm glad you're my friend, @.$h
Entries.Sun8: I've been in Pelican Town for quite some time now.$6#$e#It might be time to leave soon...$s
Entries.Sun10: I'm thinking about moving my tent soon...$6#$e#Not far, don't you worry!$h#$e#I've always thought living near the beach would be wonderful.
Entries.summer_Mon10: I don't suppose a young one like yourself has ever been married...?#$e#Just curious.$8
Entries.summer_Fri10: Have you ever been in love, @?#$e#Love is a very beautiful thing. Cherish it if you are ever lucky enough to find it.$h
Entries.summer_Sat8: Have you done any fishing lately?#$e#Fishing is a great way to relax, and a wonderful opportunity to spend time with another person.$h
Entries.summer_Sun8: Fall is approaching...$s#$e#I'm thankful for the bounty from nature, but the cold weather makes it hard for me.
Entries.summer_Sun10: Summer is a great time to bathe in the river.#$e#Just make sure no one is around!$h
Entries.fall_Tue8: Winter is right around the corner. Make sure to stay warm, @.
Entries.fall_Wed8: When the weather gets colder I leave my tent less an less.$s
Entries.fall_Wed10: Hello, @. I hope you're prepared for the winter.#$e#It's supposed to be a rough one.$s
Entries.fall_Fri10: We should have a picnic sometime to celebrate the bounty Yoba gives us in the fall.#$e#Don't forget the fresh grape wine.$h
Entries.winter_Wed10: Yoba is very gracious, but...#$e#Sometimes I wonder what it would be like if I had someone to share warmth with these long winter nights.$s
Entries.winter_Fri8: Thankfully, I've yet to freeze to death in my tent.$h
Entries.winter_Sat10: My tent gets lonely sometimes. Feel free to stop by any time, @.$h
Entries.event_dinner1: I'm so glad you like it! I only use salt to season it - the trick is making sure the fish is freshly caught!$h
Entries.event_dinner2: Well... I'm not exactly a five-star chef... but I tried.$s
Entries.event_embarrassing1: I know that... but thank you, @. Sometimes I need a reminder myself.$h
Entries.event_embarrassing2: Really...? That means so much to me, @.$8
Entries.divorced: You have no reason to be here.$a

Entries.give_flowersA: Flowers...$8#$b#... I actually disapprove of them being cut down for this reason.$2#$b#But I accept all the same.$h
Entries.give_flowersB: This is...$h#$b#Yes, I'll accept.$8#$b#Just remember my first love is nature.$h
Entries.give_pendant: I prefer living like this, but...$b#A farm is still a sustainable way of life. Yes, I'll marry you.$8#$b#A home. And one I can accept. I never thought I'd see the day... I love you.$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: @, my love, dear salt of the earth.$8#$b#Take this Yoba-given stardrop as a token of my appreciation.$h#$b#They provided them to strengthen us and our connection to the Earth.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: I have no need for dating.  I rather live out here alone.
Entries.rejectNPCB: Thanks for the offer, but no thanks.$h
Entries.reject_two_heartA: That's not a good idea. Thanks though.$h
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Dating would take me from what I love most. So no.
Entries.reject_four_heartA: That wouldn't be good for your reputation.
Entries.reject_four_heartB: You can do a lot better than some random man living out in the woods.
Entries.engageA: I don't feel comfortable with this.$2
Entries.engageB: You shouldn't be giving this to me.$2
Entries.marriedB: I might not know %spouse that much.  But I am sure this is not something they want in a marriage.$2
Entries.refusal_botherA: ... Please do not joke like that.$s
Entries.refusal_botherB: Stop it. I've made myself clear.$s
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: I'm not looking to get married.  Thanks for the offer.$h

Entries.give_flowersA: I appreciate the sentiment, but could you not?$8
Entries.give_flowersB: Reminds me of good things, but...$2
Entries.marriedB: Where are you finding these pendants, love?$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_Linus: What a beautiful day. Let's take a walk together when your work is done.$h#$e#The rain is romantic, don't you think?$8
Entries.Rainy_Night_Linus: I took a short walk today, just down to the forest.#$e#The lake is so peaceful when it's raining.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_Linus: Have some breakfast, my love. [232 227 197]$h#$e#What...? That isn't breakfast food...?$s
Entries.Indoor_Night_Linus: I cleaned the house today, sweetie. There was an impressive amount of mud inside.#$e#
Entries.Outdoor_Linus: The sky looks so open and inviting, doesn't it, @?$h
Entries.spring_Linus: What a lovely spring day to spend with my love.$h
Entries.summer_Linus: Don't forget to take breaks to cool down, my love. It's boiling.$h
Entries.fall_Linus: Autumn is such a lovely time of year.$h
Entries.winter_Linus: Wow... it must have snowed all night.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: What a beautiful day. Let's talk a walk together when your work is done.$h#$e#The rain is romantic, don't you think?$8
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: The pitter-patter of the rain reminds me of the mountains.#$e#The mountain looked stunning in the rain, but not having to worry about a leaking tent is wonderful.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Here, my love. You'll need this to stay warm today. [395]$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I think I may take a walk today.$h#$e#The valley always looks so happy to drink in the rain.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: A leak seems to be forming in the roof.$s#$e#Don't worry, my sweet. I will take care of it.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: The sound of the rain is a perfect backdrop for sleeping.#$e#It reminds me of home.$h#$e#Let's go to bed, darling.$8
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: You're soaked! Let's get you out of those damp clothes.$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I took a short walk today, just down to the forest.#$e#The lake is so peaceful when it's raining.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: It was a lonely day without you, my sweet.#$e#I'm glad you're home.$8
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Take this, my sweet. Warm yourself with something delicious. [727 728 457]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Being indoors makes me feel a bit anxious sometimes.$s#$e#But there are things to be done. I'll be fine.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Have some breakfast, my love. [232 227 197]$h#$e#What...? That isn't breakfast food...?$s
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: If you find a spider in the house, please don't kill it! Just let me know and I'll take it outside.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Today is going to be a wonderful day.$h#$e#How can I tell? I'm here with you, aren't I?$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: There are so many little things to enjoy when you're married to someone as amazing as you, @.$8
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Let me help you relax, darling.#$e#You've done so much work today. Your muscles must be so tired.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I'm glad you're home, my darling. It's been a long day without you.$h#$e#Let's have a quiet evening together.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I cleaned the house today, sweetie. There was an impressive amount of mud inside.#$e#
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: You always look so rough and sexy after a hard day's work.$8
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Here's dinner, my love. [242 202 226]#$e#I hope you enjoy it.$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: Nature misses me.$h#$e#But don't worry, darling. I love you more than the trees, or the fish, or anyting nature has to offer.$8
Entries.Outdoor_1: Just let me know if you need me to do anything, my love. I know how busy you are.$h
Entries.Outdoor_2: The fresh air is good for the soul.#$e#I'll be out here if you need anything!$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: I found this in the mountains the other day, sweetheart. [80 721 93]#$e#I hope it's helpful!$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: The sky looks so open and inviting, doesn't it, @?$h
Entries.OneKid_0: %kid1 is so perfect, @. I'm so happy!$h
Entries.OneKid_1: I'm still getting used to being a father.#$e#You seem to have parenting all figured out, @. I know I can rely on you.$h
Entries.OneKid_2: What an amazing little family we are. And here I thought I would never have a life like this.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: Little %kid1 is getting so big! It's amazing how much children grow in such little time. Like a tiny sapling in the sun.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I thought I was getting too old for children.$h#$e#I'm glad I was wrong! Being a father is great.
Entries.TwoKids_1: What a perfect little family we have!$h#$e#I love you, @.$8
Entries.TwoKids_2: Let's take %kid1 on a fishing trip, sweetheart. We can get a babysitter for %kid2.
Entries.TwoKids_3: I fed %kid1 and %kid2 already. You have nothing to worry about.$h
Entries.Good_0: I've never felt like this about another person before, @. I love you so much.$8
Entries.Good_1: You look stunning today, sweetheart.$h#$e#I hope you have an amazing day.$8
Entries.Good_2: You're looking as alluring as ever, my dear.$8#$e#Even caked in mud.$h
Entries.Good_3: I thought I was happy alone... but then I met you, my sweet.$8#$e#I never knew being in love would be so rewarding.$h
Entries.Good_4: Are you going into the mine today, my love?#$e#Bring this with you if you do. You need to stay safe. [773]
Entries.Good_5: I love you, @. I just wanted you to know that.$h
Entries.Good_6: Marrying you was the best decision I've ever made. I just feel so happy.$h#$e#I hope you feel the same.$8
Entries.Good_8: Come here and kiss me, my darling.$8
Entries.Good_9: You're perfect as ever, my sweet.#$e#You haven't aged a day.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: Have you thought about adding more windows? I like the natural light.
Entries.Neutral_1: What are you doing today, sweetheart?
Entries.Neutral_2: I think I've gained more weight since moving in...
Entries.Neutral_4: I've been putting off the cleaning... I'll take care of it today.
Entries.Neutral_6: If you're ever worried about money, you can talk to me about it.#$e#I really hate money, but I understand it's a necessary evil.$h
Entries.Neutral_7: Have I changed since we got married, @?$s
Entries.Bad_6: I need to go get away for a while. I'm going for a walk...$s#$e#Don't follow me.$9
Entries.Bad_7: You're so much younger than I am. I see that now.$s
Entries.Bad_8: I think I would've been better off alone.$s
Entries.funLeave_Linus: I'm going to go to the mountains today, my love. I'll see you when I get home.$h
Entries.funReturn_Linus: I missed you today, dear. I'm glad to be back.$8
Entries.spring_1: Nature has blessed us with another beautiful year.$h#$e#Let's not forget to be thankful.
Entries.spring_12: I always get some weird looks when I show up at the Egg Festival.$s#$e#At least you'll be there... and the deviled eggs.$h
Entries.spring_19: I found fruit growing in the forest. Here, you can have one. [634 636]$h
Entries.spring_23: The Flower Dance is tomorrow, sweetheart. I brushed up on the moves just for you.$8#$e#We'll give those young'uns a run for their money!$h
Entries.summer_1: Stay cool, my darling.$8#$e#Come inside if the sun is too much.
Entries.summer_10: There are so many possibilities for the soup tomorrow...#$e#Make a good choice, darling!$h
Entries.summer_27: The moon jellies will be here tomorrow night. They're always so beautiful and relaxing.#$e#Let's go watch them together, my love.$h
Entries.fall_1: I don't feel worried as the cold weather gets closer.#$e#I'm excited to endure it with you, @.$h#$e#I know we will keep each other warm.$8
Entries.fall_9: I went fishing when I took a walk yesterday.#$e#I hope you're hungry! [227 228]
Entries.fall_15: I actually like the fair... especially with you there, my love.$8
Entries.fall_26: Let's brave the maze tomorrow, sweetheart.$h#$e#There's no need to be scared when we're together.$h
Entries.winter_1: I can appreciate winter so much more now that it is not my enemy.#$e#The snow is beautiful... although not as beautiful as you, @.$h
Entries.winter_7: You should enter the fishing contest tomorrow, sweetheart.$h#$e#You'll blow everyone else out of the water! You're incredible.$h
Entries.winter_24: The feast is tomorrow. The entire town illuminates with joy... It's a wonderful sight.$h
Entries.winter_28: The new year is almost upon us, my love.#$e#Let's celebrate together. Here, take this. [346]$h#$e#Now come here and kiss me.$8
Entries.spouseRoom_Linus: #$c .5#I never realized how few belongings I had until I tried to fill a room with them.$h
Entries.patio_Linus: It's nice to still be able to sit out by the fire when I want to.$h#$e#Sit with me for a while.$h

Entries.marriage_Wed.000: The mountain misses me. We were there for each other for many years.
Entries.marriage_Sat.000: The forest is a lovely place. I never explored it much when I lived in the mountains.
Entries.marriage_Sat.001: Fear not, my love. I'll be home soon enough.

Entries.Linus0: I thought maybe you were joking at first...$s#$e#But you're special, @. I know you wouldn't do that.$h#$e#I trust you, and I'm happy you want to share your life with me.$8
Entries.Linus1: You're so brave, @.#$e#You're not afraid of what the other villagers will think. That means a lot.$h

Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Linus_NotSpouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You're lucky I happened to pass by!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Linus_Spouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You were gone so long I started to worry.$s#$b#Please be more careful.$s

Entries.linusSleepover: @,^If you have time, come visit me tonight.^I was thinking I could cook dinner and we could talk.^You can even sleep over if you'd like.^Come by around 6 if you're interested. I'll be waiting!^   -Linus
